head: Multi-Class Classifier
desc: Created a classifer using PCA and a multi-class percepton for the Iris dataset.

head: MiniC Compiler
desc: Developed a recursive descent compiler using LLVM for a subset of the C language.

head: Website v2
desc: Complete rewrite of my website: improving the design, cross-compatability and ease of maintenance.

head: CordShips
desc: Distributed battleships game running on Corda for R3's Engineer Hackathon which won best overall.

head: Resolution Refutation Prover
desc: Determined whether a given formula was a tautology using proof by refutiation with the resolution rule.

head: PLM Evaluator
desc: Parsed and evaluated PLM (Programming Language of the Moment) which allowed for assignments and functions.

head: Derivative Trade Manager
desc: Group project sponsored by Deutsche Bank to create an intelligent real-time derivative trade manager.

head: Energy Wastage Tracker
desc: Intelligently tracks a rooms energy wastage based on the rooms activity.

head: Timetabling
desc: Generated a valid timetable given a set of constraints and values using backtracking search with heuristics.

head: Wondough Bank
desc: Fixed vulnerabilities in a dummy banking site including with OAuth and introduced reCAPTCHA.

head: Department Store Stock Manager
desc: Implemented fuctionality to return the required data using features such as stored procedures and views.

head: Intrusion Detection System
desc: Mutithreaded primitive firewall which monitored traffic to detect a variety of different attacks.

head: Proxy Server
desc: A simple proxy server for intercepting HTTP requests between a client and a server.

head: Scraper
desc: Semi-intelligently scraped profiles from LinkedIn Recruiter copying the results to the clipboard.

head: Website v1
desc: A dynamic single page site showing information about me and past projects I've been involved with.

head: Blockchain
desc: A simple blockchain containing an arbitrary number of blocks. Each block contained data and the hash of the previous block.

head: Witter
desc: Replicated the basic functionality of Twitter, using AVL trees and Hash tables as the core data structures.

head: Scratch Clone
desc: Developed an evalutor capable of parsing instructions, updating the state and outputting the updated state.

head: Mastermind
desc: Implemented Donald Knuth's algorithm to facilitate cracking any 4 character code in a maximum of 5 guesses.

head: Buggy Controller
desc: Group project to develop code for a microprocessor which allowed a buggy to follow a visible path.

head: Maze
desc: Navigated a robot around a virtual maze using DFS without crashing into walls whilst moving closer to the target.

head: Virtual Trading
desc: A client-server virtual forex trading platform utilising networking and threading with a GUI.
